thread.title: Amazing place, lovely employees
thread.title_full: Amazing place, lovely employees - Review of The Nadler Soho, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: urorodrigo
title: Amazing place, lovely employees
text: My last trip in London during the EAU was amazing. That was my second time in London and in the last six nights The Nadler Soho put us in the center of most interesting neighborhood of London. The care provided by the staff of the reception was lovely, in especial by Lili, Jessica and Alberto. The best option when I return in London next year.
